results.title: Metformin mitigates SASP secretion and LPS-triggered hyper-inflammation in Doxorubicin-induced senescent endothelial cells

results.title: The ameliorating effects of metformin on disarrangement ongoing in gastrocnemius muscle of sarcopenic and obese sarcopenic mice.
results.journal: Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Basis Dis
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_18033 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ signaling pathway was involved in the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. These findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment may be conducive to the prevention of age-related @DISEASE_Sarcopenia @DISEASE_MESH:D055948 @@@sarcopenia@@@ by regulating @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism in skeletal muscle, i.e. enhanced lipolysis and attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Job_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007589 @@@hyper@@@-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ responses, which may be AMPK-dependent processes.

results.title: Metformin acts to suppress beta-hydroxybutyric acid-mediated inflammatory responses through activation of AMPK signaling in bovine hepatocytes.
results.text_hl: The occurrence of @SPECIES_9913 @@@bovine@@@ @DISEASE_Ketosis @DISEASE_MESH:D007662 @@@ketosis@@@ involves the accumulation of @CHEMICAL_3_Hydroxybutyric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020155 @@@beta-hydroxybutyric acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_3_Hydroxybutyric_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020155 @@@BHBA@@@), which contributes to the initiation and acceleration of hepatic metabolic stress and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has other beneficial effects apart from its medical intervention for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, such as prevention of laminitis and @<m>DISEASE_Job_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007589 @@@hyper-triglyceridemic@@@.

citations.NLM: Xu T, Lu X, Arbab AAI, Wu X, Mao Y, Loor JJ, Yang Z. Metformin acts to suppress beta-hydroxybutyric acid-mediated inflammatory responses through activation of AMPK signaling in bovine hepatocytes. J Anim Sci. 2021 Jul 1;99(7):. PMID: 33982074

results.title: Effect of metformin hydrochloride in correcting hyperinsulinemia and high leptin levels in treatment of infertile polycystic patients.

results.title: [Diagnosis and treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome].
results.text_hl: Subsequent to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration, the reduction of @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyper I@@@ and androgen serum levels creates a favorable condition for the resumption of ovarian function and @CHEMICAL_Clomiphene @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002996 @@@clomiphene citrate@@@ action.

results.title: Combining treatment with myo-inositol and D-chiro-inositol (40:1) is effective in restoring ovary function and metabolic balance in PCOS patients.
results.text_hl: @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@Insulin@@@-sensitizing drugs, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, are effective in treating @<m>DISEASE_Job_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007589 @@@hyper-insulinemic@@@ @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
